legacy.desc3: Deposit or Withdraw at any time
legacy.createTips:
Create a new legacy contract, deposit or withdraw at any time,
and it will automatically distribute the balance to the beneficiaries
when the time you set arrived.
legacy.beneficiaryWalletPlaceholder: Please enter the address of the beneficiary wallet
legacy.formDesc: Create a new legacy contract, deposit or withdraw at any time, and it will automatically distribute the balance to the beneficiaries when the time you set arrived.
